DocLocalization.Name: Propriété à valeur issue d'un énumération

DocAttribute.Name: EnumerationValues
EnumerationReference
DocAttribute.Documentation: Enumeration from which a enumeration value has been selected. The referenced enumeration also establishes the unit of the enumeration value.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR21
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Each value within the list of _EnumerationValues_ shall be a member of the list of _EnumerationValues_ at the referenced _IfcPropertyEnumeration_ (provided that both, the _EnumerationValues_ and _EnumerationReference_, are asserted).
DocWhereRule.Expression: NOT(EXISTS(EnumerationReference)) OR NOT(EXISTS(EnumerationValues)) OR (SIZEOF(QUERY(temp <* EnumerationValues | temp IN EnumerationReference.EnumerationValues)) = SIZEOF(EnumerationValues))
